description:
Bring your rain jacket back to life. This spray-on treatment restores the durable water-repellency (DWR) finish on your waterproof-breathable jackets and pants. The spray applicator lets you apply it directly to areas that require the most waterproofing (like elbows and seams) without compromising the wicking properties of knitted wicking liners.

  • Safe for waterproof-breathable fabrics including GORE-TEX® and eVent®
  • Water-based, non-aerosol, non-flammable formula is biodegradable
  • Contains no VOCs or fluorocarbons
  • 500ml size includes a spray nozzle. 1000ml refill size does not include a spray nozzle
name: Nikwax TX.Direct Spray-On Waterproofer Bulk
